CustomField.description: Created field for BIZ-45134 story - to show approval alert on pricing proposal
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Pricing Proposal"), IMAGE("/resource/SegmentLeader",'SL',25,25)+'Segment Leader', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && Approval_Level__c = 0, 'No Approval Required', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && Hierarchy_level__c = 1, IMAGE("/resource/SegmentLeader",'SL',25,25)+'Segment Leader', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && Hierarchy_level__c = 2, IMAGE("/resource/IndustrySalesLead",'ISL',25,25)+'Industry Sales Lead', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && Hierarchy_level__c = 3, IMAGE("/resource/CRO",'CRO',25,25)+'CRO', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && (Hierarchy_level__c = 4), IMAGE("/resource/COO",'COO',25,25)+'COO', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && (Hierarchy_level__c = 5), IMAGE("/resource/SVPFinance",'SF',25,25)+'SVP Finance', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && (Approval_Level__c = 6) && (Hierarchy_level__c = 0),'Service segment lead', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && (Approval_Level__c = 7)&& (Hierarchy_level__c = 0),'SVP Service', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && (Hierarchy_level__c = 8),'CRO/COO', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && (Approval_Level__c = 9)&& (Hierarchy_level__c = 0),'COO/CPO', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && (Approval_Level__c = 10)&& (Hierarchy_level__c = 0),'CPO&COO', IF(ISPICKVAL(Quote_Stage__c,"Finalize OSA") && (Approval_Level__c = 11)&& (Hierarchy_level__c = 0),'Others','' )))))) )))) )))
CustomField.label: Approval Check
